document.full_text: the head of egypt's prestigious seat of sunni muslim learning, al-azhar, condemned u.s. troops' disposal of the body of osama bin laden at sea monday as an affront to religious and human values.
document.title: islamic leader condemns bin laden sea burial
lines_and_colors: the head of egypt's prestigious seat of sunni muslim learning, al-azhar, condemned u.s. troops' disposal of the body of osama bin laden at sea monday as an affront to religious and human values.
